summary: "Bridge to Terabithia" is a 2007 American fantasy drama film about two kids, Jesse and Leslie, who create an imaginary world called Terabithia to escape their problems. Based on a book by Katherine Paterson, the movie was directed by Gábor Csupó. Filming took place in New Zealand in 2006. The film was well-received by critics and made over $137 million worldwide. It won several awards, including five at the Young Artist Awards.
title: Bridge to Terabithia (2007 film)
